item.description:
We will be getting together on the 20th for our 2nd social event. The whenisgood responses were very close 13 for the 20th and 12 for the 27th. Sorry that it doesn't work out for everyone. November and December are tough months for everyone... I made reservations for 20 at Slattery's in Fitchburg. Please RSVP as soon as possible so I can change the reservation if need be.

They cannot split the check up so please bring cash! There prices are reasonable and they have a LARGE menu (Slatterys Restaurant Menus). If there are any changes I'll keep you posted.

-Chris
item.name: 2nd Central Mass Atheist Meetup Dinner & Drinks
